name: Poramid
description:
Poramid is a game about Onubis, Anubis' son, who decided to run his own business as a pyramid builder. guide him as he takes his clients' requests and tries his best at using weird technologies.

this was made in 72 hours for ludum dare #36. actually this is the post-jam version, the actual one had only half the tools and whatnot. you can download it too but it's not really worth playing tbh lol

opode games is:

  • kcyred (concept, level design, writing)
  • mizu (concept, art, writing)
  • raphaelgoulart (music, art, level design)
  • unphook (programming, art)
  • vxdeed (art)

also the Munro font has been used extensively through the game.

relevant links:

  • ld#36 page
  • public repo with source code (unity, c#, mit license)
  • behance project page (with cute original hand drawn concept stuff!)
  • original soundtrack
